name: Governance & DAOs
description: Deep dive into decentralized governance structures and the role of DAOs in blockchain networks.

cards.title: DAO Governance Models
cards.description: Understanding different models of decentralized autonomous organizations.
cards.bulletpoints: On-chain vs. off-chain governance, treasury control, member incentives
cards.summaryText: Contrast on-chain and off-chain coordination, outline how treasuries are safeguarded, and note incentive designs that keep contributors engaged.

cards.title: Voting Mechanisms & Consensus
cards.description: Exploring different voting mechanisms in decentralized governance.
cards.bulletpoints: Token-based voting, quadratic voting, snapshot governance
cards.summaryText: Review token-weighted voting pitfalls, show how quadratic voting balances whales, and mention Snapshot for gasless signaling.

cards.title: Protocol Treasury Management
cards.description: Managing decentralized treasuries and funding ecosystem development.
cards.bulletpoints: Treasury allocation, grants programs, inflation control
cards.summaryText: Detail treasury allocation frameworks, grant review loops, and monetary levers that keep inflation aligned with growth.
